channel.title: 4chan threads from multiple boards
channel.description: Threads from multiple boards with more than 30 replies

item.title: [ 42] Why do TES fans pretend to like Morrowind? I'm not even arguing about the ga
item.description:
Why do TES fans pretend to like Morrowind?

I'm not even arguing about the game being good, I don't care about that. But whenever I see comments online, it's painfully obvious that a lot of Morrowind fans have only experienced it through some youtube 3 hour long Essay.

Original filename: 61Cz-Q8D5AL._AC_UF1000,1000_QL80_.jpg

item.title: [ 91] /pcbg/ - PC Building General
item.description:
>UPGRADE & BUILD ADVICE.
Post build list or current specs including MONITOR: https://pcpartpicker.com/
Provide specific use cases.
State BUDGET and COUNTRY or you will NOT be helped.
Building guide: https://wiki.installgentoo.com/index.php/Build_a_PC

>CASE (from $ to $$$)
mATX: Asus Prime AP201, Lian Li A3, O11 Air Mini
ATX: Phanteks XT PRO (ULTRA), Montech AIR 903 Base/MAX, Lian Li Lancool 207, Antec C8, Antec Flux Pro
AVOID: NXZT, 'Silent' cases, fanless cases, Corsair 6500

>CPU
Budget: 9600X, 7600X, 7500f
Gaming: AMD X3D
Workstation: 9950X, 7950X
AVOID Shittel

>COOLER
AIO: Best Value: Thermalright Frozen Prism, Premium LCD: Lian Li Galahad II LCD
Double towers: Thermalright Phantom Spirit 120 SE, Noctua NH-D15 G2
ITX/>42mm RAM: Scythe Fuma 3/TR AXP120-X67

>MOTHERBOARD
ASRock B850M-X, ASRock B850 LiveMixer WiFi, ASRock X870 Pro RS, ASRock Phantom Gaming X870E Nova WiFi
ONLY BUY ASROCK MOBOS

>RAM
DDR4: 2x16GB 3200CL16. Budget, 2x8GB
DDR5: 2x16GB 6000CL30
Workstation/high end: consider 2x32GB

>SSD (OS drive)
Budget: Silicon Power UD90
Mid range: SN770
Premium: SN850X
Flagship: Sabrent Rocket 5
DO NOT: Overspend on gen 5 ssds, or cache for non workstation builds.

>GPU
1080p: No VRAM: RTX 5060 and RTX 5060 TI 8GB, Fake Frames: RTX 5060 TI 16GB, Real Performance: RX 9060 XT
1440p: Fake Frames: RTX 5070 TI, Real Performance: RX 9070 XT, Budget: RX 9060 XT
4K: Fire Starter: RTX 5090, Scam Enjoyer: RTX 5080, Affordable: 9070 XT
Workstation: AVOID AMD cards
Value For Money: AVOID Ngreedia cards
ALWAYS pair AMD GPUs with AMD CPUs for SAM https://imgur.com/a/7XecPGL

>PSU
PSU buying guide:
https://hwbusters.com/best_picks/best-atxv3-pcie5-ready-psus-picks-hardware-busters/

>MONITOR
https://pcmonitors.info/recommendations/

>OS
Activate Windows @ >>>/g/fwt

>CASE FANS
Meta: Case with good stock PWM fans
Mid range: Arctic P12/P14 (Max) (5-pack)
High end: Noctua NF-A12x25, Noctua NF-A14x25 G2

Previous: >>105086056

Original filename: koq4296xxv621.png

item.title: [109] /iemg/ & /pmpg/ - In-Ear Monitor & Portable Music Player General
item.description:
Evergreen goat edition
How to request advice:
>Budget
>Intended use (media, source, environment)
>Frequency response preference and music examples
>Past gear and your thoughts on them

FAQ:
>Where do I buy IEMs?
Amazon, Aliexpress, Linsoul, Hifigo, Shenzhenaudio

>Shopping Guide (IEMs, Cables, Ear Tips, etc.):
https://rentry.org/consoomer_guide

>EQ Guide (Measurements, Targets, Equalizer, etc.):
https://4ciemg.github.io/IEM-EQ-Guide/

>/iemg/'s Blog/Wiki:
https://4ciemg.github.io/IEMGazette/

>Frequency Response Graph Tool
squig.link

>Budget Wire Over-Ear IEMs:
• Tanchjim Bunny (Mild U) - $20
• Truthear Gate (Neutral) - $23
• EPZ Q1 Pro / G10 (V-shape) - $35
• Kiwi Ears Cadenza (Warm Neutral) - $35
• Simgot EA500LM (Bright Neutral) - $70

>Bullet IEMs:
• Tanchjim ONE DSP (Neutral) - $28
• Etymotic ER2XR (Neutral) - $140

>Flathead Earbuds:
• Blue Vido (Warm) - $5
• Faaeal Iris 2.0 (Warm) - $10

>USB-C DACs:
• JCALLY JM20 - $22
• Tanchjim Stargate II (8-Band PEQ) - $38
• Fosi Audio DS2 2024 (CS43131) - $45
• Qudelix 5K (20-Band PEQ/GEQ) - $110

>PMPs:
• HiBy R1 - $85
• Hifi Walker H2 / Surfans F20 (Rockbox) - $120
• HiBy M300 - $200
• Hidizs AP80 Pro-X - $200

>AVOID USING:
• Mainboard audio when using multi-driver pos

item.title: [ 47] KFC'S USA Collapse
item.description:
KFC is now behind Raising Cane's and Wingstop in sales in the USA, and might not exist for much longer.
While their parent company has increase sales, all other major chicken chains have increased sales, and even KFC internationally is increasing sales, KFC sales dropped 4% in 2024. They are now #23 in sales for chain restaurants and #5 for chicken-focused brands, behind Raising Cane's and Wingstop.
Regardless if they are outdated or their low-quality shit might fly in Europe and Asia but not the USA competitive market, KFC's nosediving in interest might eventually mean a complete collapse in the USA market that they'd have to withdraw from.
https://www.restaurantdive.com/news/kfc-raising-canes-wingstop-us-chicken-market-share/745868/

Original filename: re42.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [126] /cfb/ - Lee Corso, 89
item.description:
>Lee Corso set to Retire from College GameDay
Legendary ESPN analyst Lee Corso, 89, will retire after 38 years on "College GameDay," with his final show on August 30, 2025

>Cam Ward Goes No. 1 in NFL Draft (Titans)
Miami QB Cam Ward was picked No. 1 overall by the Tennessee Titans in the 2025 NFL Draft, lauded for his record-setting 158 career touchdown passes and dual-threat ability

>Travis Hunter Drafted No. 2 Overall (Jags)
Colorado’s two-way star Travis Hunter was selected No. 2 by the Jacksonville Jaguars in the 2025 NFL Draft, praised for his versatility as a cornerback and wide receiver

>Ashton Jeanty’s First-Round Selection (Raiders)
Boise State RB Ashton Jeanty, with 2,601 rushing yards in 2024, was a first-round pick in the 2025 NFL Draft, defying the trend of devalued running backs with his dynamic play.

>Shedeur Sanders’ Draft Slide
Browns, lmao

Original filename: lee.png
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 36] I made carbonara with all the "correct" ingredients, expensive ass guanciale an
item.description:
I made carbonara with all the "correct" ingredients, expensive ass guanciale and pecorino Romano
And as I'm eating it all I can think to myself is this is just some shitty macaroni and cheese, That cost a ton of money to make and doesn't taste as good

So I made it again but this time used aged cheddar and Hickory smoked bacon, All the exact same proportions as the first recipe and it was so much better

So I realize the reason Italians get so butt hurt whenever someone changes one of their terrible recipes is because simple substitutions blows their terrible food out of the water

Original filename: 20250424_132922.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [192] Joe Kelly begins to destroy Peter Parker as a character
item.description:
Discover Peter Parker's rebellious past in Amazing Spider-Man #2, surprising fans with unexpected revelations.
Hallucinogens trigger memories of Peter's youthful adventures, revealing a different side to his character.

It turns out he might not have always been the goody-two-shoes scientific studying student with the glasses, who got the reputation for being a wallflower, and one beaten up regularly by Flash Thompson.

Instead, he was a porn-reading shoplifter, caught by the police stealing beer

item.title: [ 33] /jpg/ - Japan General
item.description:
Kagura Edition

ー How do I travel by public transportation? ー
Use Google Maps within cities, install the Jorudan or Navitime app for intercity travel

ー What should I see in <place>? ー
https://www.wikivoyage.org/
https://www.japan-guide.com/
https://www.jnto.go.jp/
>Solid general guides - sights, sample itineraries, pre-travel considerations, etc
https://www.google.com/maps/d/edit?mid=1fmfaySQHmojbRGKWCwRecq6Ln1Bb2Xdh&ll=35.67928012473078%2C139.68638283648374&z=12
*You should check on google if a place is still in business before you plan to visit it*

ーJR Passー
Since JR has adjusted the prices for the pass, not really worth it anymore, unless you want to travel by train very extensively. You can plug in your itinerary in the links below and compare prices to the JR Pass.
>https://japantravel.navitime.com/en/area/jp/route/
>https://world.jorudan.co.jp/mln/en/
With the increased price of the JR Pass, local train passes might be good deals now.
>https://www.japan-guide.com/e/e2357.html

New prices starting May 2024
>7 day Pass: ¥50,000
>14 day Pass: ¥80,000
>21 day Pass: ¥100,000
https://www.japan-guide.com/railpass/

ーInfo on Degeneracy ー
READ THE INFO LISTED HERE. STOP TALKING ABOUT IT IN THE THREAD.

>https://chn.cityheaven.net/
>https://rockitrisingsun.com
>https://paradise-tokyo.net
>https://hentaitokyo.com
>https://tokyoadultguide.com/

Previous: >>2773718

item.title: [123] Mods need new certs edition Previous: 404 not found READ THE WIKI! & help
item.description:
Mods need new certs edition

Previous: 404 not found

READ THE WIKI! & help by contributing:
https://wiki.installgentoo.com/wiki/Home_server

/hsg/ is about learning and expanding your horizons. Know all about NAS? Learn virtualization. Spun up some VMs? Learn about networking by standing up a OPNsense/PFsense box and configuring some VLANs. There's always more to learn and chances to grow. Think you’re god-tier already? Setup OpenStack and report back.

>What software should I run?
Install Gentoo. Or whatever flavor of *nix is best for the job or most comfy for you. Jellyfin/Emby/Plex to replace Netflix, Nextcloud to replace Googlel, Ampache/Navidrome to replace Spotify, the list goes on. Look at the awesome self-hosted list and ask.

>Why should I have a home server?
De-botnet your life. Learn something new. Serving applications to yourself, your family, and your frens feels good. Put your tech skills to good use for yourself and those close to you. Store their data with proper availability redundancy and backups and serve it back to them with a /comfy/ easy to use interface.

>Links & resources
Cool stuff to host: https://github.com/awesome-selfhosted/awesome-selfhosted
https://reddit.com/r/datahoarder
https://www.labgopher.com
https://www.reddit.com/r/homelab/wiki/index
https://wiki.debian.org/FreedomBox/Features
ARM-based SBCs: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1PGaVu0sPBEy5GgLM8N-CvHB2FESdlfBOdQKqLziJLhQ
Low-power x86 systems: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1LHvT2fRp7I6Hf18LcSzsNnjp10VI-odvwZpQZKv_NCI
SFF cases https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1AddRvGWJ_f4B6UC7_IftDiVudVc8CJ8sxLUqlxVsCz4/
Cheap disks: https://shucks.top/ https://diskprices.com/
PCIE info: https://files.catbox.moe/id6o0n.pdf
>i226-V NICs are bad for servers
>For more SATA ports, use PCIe SAS HBAs in IT mode
WiFi fixing: pastebin.com/raw/vXJ2PZxn (embed)
Cockpit is nice for remote administration

Remember:
RAID protects you from DOWNTIME
BACKUPS protect you from DATA LOSS

Original filename: 1718928092766125.jpg
item.author: /hsg/ - Home Server General

item.title: [ 96] /dmp/ Digital Music Production
item.description:
Wikis
https://dmpdoc.neocities.org/
https://mu-sic-production.fandom.com/wiki//mu/sic_Production_Wiki

>/g/ makes a 15th album
Theme: Trackers only
Deadline: 10th of May, 11:00 UTC
Listening party: 11th of May, 20:00 UTC
Submissions for this theme must include a tracker file in addition to audio.
The following tracker formats are allowed: .xm, .mod, .it, as well as formats that chiptune trackers export to, such as lsdj
>Check out these trackers to get started
https://milkytracker.org/
https://openmpt.org/
https://github.com/tildearrow/furnace

>/g/ makes a 16th album
Theme: Italo Disco
Deadline: 17th of May, 11:00 UTC
Listening party: 18th of May, 20:00 UTC

Submissions for either album are welcome.

>IMPORTANT! READ THIS BEFORE SUBMITTING:
Upload the file somewhere, preferably in a lossless format, and post the link here. If you want to update your track, make a new post.
Include the song title in the post, and make it clear that your song is a submission for the album.
Optionally you may include cover art for your track, but please state that the image attached is the cover art or it won't be included. Artist names won't be included.
Songs that contain anything against YouTube's policies won't be uploaded on YT, but will still be added to the album.
All tracks will be normalised to -14 LUFS in the release. If your song has a lot of dynamic range and you want to keep it, just say so in the submission.

>Where can I hear the previous albums?
https://rentry.org/dmpalbums

Previous: >>105037913

Original filename: Screenshot_2025-04-25-20-14-23-228_com.sec.android.app.sbrowser-edit.jpg

item.title: [486] /co/ General Drawthread
item.description:
>Provide References for all requested characters and keep them to one image/post
>Keep requests /co/ related and keep them concise.
>General OC discussion belongs in "Work on your art" and the Donut Steel threads.
>However, OC requests are allowed as long as they aren't /trash/ material or fanfiction. If it's not /coc/ you must provide a link to the comic or cartoon.
>Be patient and take it easy! Don't forget to check the booru to see if your request was filled.
>Drawfriends, don't hold back.
>If a post breaks the rules, DO report and hide it. DON'T respond to it.
>Keep art critique short, otherwise take it to the Batman thread.
>No one is entitled to a request delivery.
>Don't bump or "second", "third", etc. requests. They eat up the post limit.
>No spam.
>Don't fight spam with spam.
>No begging.
>No AI deliveries, no AI discussion. Take them where they're wanted.
>To make the new Drawthread, wait for page 10 at bump limit.
>Have fun!

>Collection of Deliveries:
https://co.llection.pics/

>Drawfriends Gallery List:
rentry.org/txf8t

NSFW deliveries and requests should be posted in:
>>>/aco/drawthread
or
>>>/i/795305

item.title: [187] /tcg/ Trading Card Game General
item.description:
Mushboo Edition

>I want to learn the game, where do I begin?
Download PTCGL at https://tcg.pokemon.com/en-us/tcgl
The game has a quick tutorial and a bunch of decent decks to get you started against other beginners or against the AI. Some of those decks are very close to meta too. You can also go to your local game store and see if people are playing Pokémon.

>I know how to play, how do I make my own deck?
You have a decent beginner's guide at https://www.justinbasil.com/guide
There's also the old /tcg/ guide at https://imgur.com/a/W4NkOu6
After that, look up meta decks and try to reverse engineer them to see how things work.

>Where to find meta decks?
For big irl events, go to https://limitlesstcg.com/decks
For online events, go to https://play.limitlesstcg.com/decks?game=PTCG
For japanese events, go to https://pokecabook.com/archives/1417

Previous thread: >>57696554

Old /tcg/ pastebin: https://pastebin.com/Ge95YuMA

Original filename: 29297796_p0.jpg

item.title: [ 64] Tried to summit Mount Washington today. A group of, older men, completely cock
item.description:
Tried to summit Mount Washington today. A group of, older men, completely cock blocked me while I was pretty far up. They told me I had no business being there alone with the gear I had. I'm so fucking fed up man. I ran into this same fucking issue earlier this year when trying to do Mount Katahdin via the Knife Edge and a fucking park ranger refused to let me continue up to it. I'm so fucking over hiking. This sport has been nothing but pain with all the fucking rich boomers gatekeeping everything cool.
